body: start by indicating whether you're building or fixing the code, and then followed by the commit message.
Start by selecting a unique title followed by a description that clearly explains what made you create the project, what problems does it solve, and who is the user.

use git init to initiate a git repository, use git add to add information to the repository, use git commit to commit the update and leave a message to explain the update, use git push to push the data remotely to github.
